creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Marilyn Tupper Doe
description: December: silver-colored pavilion set behind a pond lined with trees; snow-covered ground and trees line edges of pond; framed by pine trees covered with snow
medium: Color woodblock print: ink and colors on paper
title: Twelve Months of Kyoto (Snow scene at the Golden Pavillion)
